markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Plant Evidence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1781) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 134 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Alkenstar Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=183) (Level 4)

**Prerequisites**
[Pickpocket](/Feats.aspx?ID=818)

</column>

---

You can put a single item you're holding of light or negligible Bulk onto a person without them noticing by succeeding at a [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) check against their Perception DC. If you have the [ruffian](/Rackets.aspx?ID=1) racket, you can do this as a free action when you successfully [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) a target.
name: Plant Evidence
